::Prowl/Zardus::

Prowl's optic widen as he sees Oblitertron fire a single shot off at Iron 
Raptor.

"Watch out!" He yells, tackling Iron Raptor out of the way of the blast, 
which halmlessley hits the ground behind the two bots. He turns to look up at 
Oblitertron while reaching out with a hand to help Iron Raptor stand up, if 
she was in a condition to do so.

"Zardus," he says into his comm-link, "Call your troops off. We are allied."

Zardus' voice replies, tinged with amusement. "The situation is out of my 
controll, Maximal. I must remind you, though: the Maximals had opened fire on 
my troops first, now you Maximals can deal with the punishment."

Prowl looks up to see Zardus hovering in the air above him, using his jetpack 
to keep him in the air. The alliance leader was obvioustly enjoying this. 
Prowl curses under his breath, looking back at Oblitertron. He hoped Iron 
Raptor would get up soon. It was much easier to get a standing bot out of the 
way of a shot than a laying one.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Up in the air, Zardus flies over to Nemesis Enfocer.

"If Oblitertron starts having trouble, we will land, weapons aimed at their 
backs. Don't open fire unless they do, though, the Maximals will be usefull 
against Set and Shuko."

Zardus looks down at Perndabot, who is getting up, using a boulder for 
support, and relays the same orders to him.
